title: At a Touch Tank
description: This book describes the types of animals that live in an Alaskan coast touch tank. Students will have the opportunity to compare and contrast invertebrates that live along the coast of Alaska.
meta: Alaska, anemones, gently, sea cucumber, tentacles, touch tank
Use the reading strategy of asking and answering questions to understand text
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast
Consonant Digraphs : Discriminate initial and final consonant digraph sh
High-Frequency Words : Recognize and use high-frequency word this

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
